archimate:Requirement.name: IM.1.1.9: Anonymisation techniques (i.e. hash functions combined with a salt value) should be considered to irreversibly alter sensitive information prior to processing, depending on the requirements of the processing.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
